item.title: One of 2023's Best Indie Games Is Getting a Physical Release and Vinyl Soundtrack
item.description:
Highlights

  • The award-winning indie game Cocoon is getting a Collector's Edition with extra goodies and a vinyl soundtrack.
  • Cocoon's unique puzzles and synthetic sound-based music set it apart in the indie gaming world.
  • The Collector's Edition will feature a crystal orb light, art cards, poster, and pre-orders start May 23 at 9 AM PT.

Cocoon , a highly praised indie game from 2023, will soon get a Collector's Edition and a vinyl record of the game's music. Notably, the Collector's Edition of Cocoon will feature additional goodies on top of the base game.

The year 2023 was chock full of great games , ranging from indie hits like Cocoon to AAA blockbusters like Marvel's Spider-Man 2 . Following its significant success last year, Cocoon is set to receive its own Collector's Edition containing a bunch of extras for the fans. This news emerges as an exciting development for those who have been waiting for a long time for the physical release of the game.

Related
Cocoon Interview: Dev Talks Boss Fights, Vertex Painting, Audio Composition, and More

Game Rant speaks with Jeppe Carlsen, Jakob Schmid, and Erwin Kho about their mind-bending, worlds-within-worlds puzzle adventure game Cocoon.

Recently, iam8bit announced that the Collector's Edition of developer Geometric Interactive's puzzle game Cocoon , one of the best-rated indies from 2023 , is coming soon for Switch and PS5. Although the game was originally published by Annapurna Interactive, its forthcoming edition will be published by iam8bit. In addition to that, a vinyl version of the game's soundtrack has also been revealed. It features a "Classic Black" vinyl containing music by Cocoon composer Jakob Schmid.

Cocoon Collector's Edition Specifications

  • Base game
  • 3-inch laser-etched crystal orb light alongside an activator pedestal
  • 11x17-inch double-sided poster sporting original art
  • Five orb art cards
  • Exclusive cover art
  • Price: $74.99 USD
  • Release window: Q4 2024

The Collector's Edition of Cocoon contains a physical copy of the game and a bunch of merchandise. This includes art pieces, such as exclusive cover art, an 11x17-inch double-sided poster showcasing original art, and five orb art cards. Additionally, the set also comes with a combo of a 3-inch laser-etched crystal orb light and an activator pedestal. While the Collector's Edition is priced at $74.99 USD, the vinyl edition of the game's soundtrack has a price tag of $32.99 USD. Both the Collector's Edition and the vinyl record are scheduled to be up for pre-orders starting from May 23, 9 AM PT. According to iam8bit's website, similar to the Collector's Edition, the vinyl currently also has a targeted release window of Q4 2024.

Given the award-laden successful run of Cocoon , it seems only natural for the game to eventually spawn a collector's edition. The well-received approach to puzzles that Cocoon takes is an evolution from those featured in certain other popular indie puzzle games. That's because Cocoon is the latest game by director Jeppe Carlsen , who was also the designer behind the highly rated puzzle titles Limbo and Inside.

Moreover, the soundtrack of Cocoon , which has been fully constructed using synthetic sounds instead of recorded sounds, is also something that stands out. Schmid's music, which is nearly a constant presence throughout the game, adds a layer of immersion to Cocoon 's surreal microscopic world . The puzzle-adventure title's music also gained recognition among the community as it helped the game bag multiple award nominations for audio design. Fans will soon be able to own this audio in physical form once the vinyl record becomes available later this year.

item.title: Genshin Impact Reveals 4.7 Quality-of-Life Changes
item.description:
Highlights

  • Genshin Impact's Version 4.7 will bring quality-of-life changes like an increased Resin cap and artifact customization upgrades.
  • Players can expect to collect 11,225 Primogems in the update, with more events and rewards to enhance the gameplay experience.
  • The upcoming version introduces new events like Mutual Security Enhancing Simulation, offering tower defense-style gameplay and generous rewards.

Genshin Impact has revealed several quality-of-life changes that will be available in version 4.7. In every version, Genshin Impact usually adds small quality-of-life changes to improve the overall experience without altering core mechanics. These improvements are aimed toward both newcomers and veterans, making it easier to perform specific actions, such as upgrading artifacts, creating custom loadouts, and claiming expedition rewards.

Over the past years, Genshin Impact has brought numerous quality-of-life changes based on player feedback. For example, the gacha-based RPG recently introduced the Focused Experience mode, which allows players to skip side quests. The game has also added the Trading Guide feature that provides character build suggestions. It's now been confirmed that more quality-of-life changes will be added to Genshin Impact next month.

Related
Genshin Impact Player Creates Impressive Village in Serenitea Pot

A Genshin Impact player uses the game's Serenitea Pot housing system to construct a stunning village within their in-game home.

Genshin Impact will bring several quality-of-life changes, including an increased Original Resin cap and recommended stats function for artifact custom configurations, in the version 4.7 update. According to the developers, the cap for Original Resin will be increased from 160 to 200, and players will be able to make five resins at once. Starting from Genshin Impact 's version 4.7 , the inventory limit for Artifact Enhancement Materials, Forging Ores, and Character EXP Materials will be raised to 99,999. Travelers will be able to hold many more materials at a time.

Genshin Impact Version 4.7 Quality-of-Life Changes

  • The cap of Original Resin will be raised to 200.
  • The inventory limit for ingredients will be increased to 9,999.
  • The inventory limit for Character EXP Materials, Artifact Enhancement Materials, and Forging Ores will be raised to 99,999.
  • The cap of in-game friends will be increased to 100.
  • Recommended Stats will be added to Fast Equip > Custom Configuration within the Artifacts menu.

In the upcoming version, the cap on in-game friends will be increased to 100, and the Recommended Stats feature will be added to Fast Equip > Custom Configuration within the Artifacts menu. Additionally, the inventory limit for ingredients will be raised from 2,000 to 9,999 in update 4.7, which is expected to arrive on or around June 5.

Genshin Impact players will earn a total of 11,225 Primogems in the upcoming update. According to the chart, 45% of these Primogems will allegedly be obtained from events, daily commissions, and quests. Players will get more than 3,900 from Spiral Abyss and Imaginarium Theater combat modes. Moreover, they will receive at least 600 free currencies as maintenance compensation.

As per the latest leaks, Genshin Impact 's version 4.7 will introduce four events , including Mutual Security Enhancing Simulation that functions similarly to a tower defense game. Players will allegedly deploy units, defend objectives, and complete challenges during the upcoming event to secure generous rewards. In addition to Mutual Security Enhancing Simulation, version 4.7 will add Spino Doubleblaster, Endless Forms Most Material, and Record of Reflective Writing, which will reportedly give away hundreds of Primogems.

item.title: Genshin Impact 4.7 Special Program Livestream Date and Time Confirmed
item.description:
Highlights

  • Genshin Impact 4.7 Special Program has been confirmed for May 24, 08:00 AM (UTC-4).
  • Two new five-star characters, Clorinde and Sigewinne, are set to arrive in upcoming banner cycles.
  • Sethos, a new four-star character, will also be released in the Genshin Impact Version 4.7 update.

Genshin Impact has officially confirmed the release date and time for the upcoming 4.7 Special Program. HoYoverse always hosts a livestream event approximately 10 days before an update arrives, revealing most of the upcoming content like new regions, quest lines, and characters.

Genshin Impact 's social media accounts have already confirmed the arrival of two new five-star characters, Clorinde and Sigewinne. While there is still no official information about their exact release date, Travelers can expect the two to appear on separate banner cycles, with rumors claiming that Clorinde will be part of the first banner while Sigewinne should appear on the second banner.

Related
Genshin Impact Leak Reveals Unused Pet Concept for Tighnari

A new Genshin Impact leak shows a pet concept that was part of the original design for Sumeru's famous Forest Watcher and Tighnari.

A new post on Genshin Impact's official Twitter account has revealed more details about the upcoming Version 4.7 livestream event. According to the announcement, the Special Program for update 4.7 will be held on May 24 at 08:00 AM (UTC-4) . While HoYoverse is yet to confirm the update's exact release date, going by the usual update schedule, players can expect Genshin Impact Version 4.7 to drop around June 5. The art in the official announcement features two characters, Sigewinne and Clorinde. However, they won't be the only new roster additions in this update, as HoYoverse also confirmed the release of a new four-star character, Sumeru's Electro user Sethos.

Genshin Impact Special Program 4.7 Release Date and Time

When it comes to their playstyle, recent Genshin Impact beta leaks have revealed that Clorinde will be a new main DPS with a playstyle similar to Keqing. Two of her greatest strengths are her ability to fit almost any team composition in Genshin Impact and the fact that players won't need to invest too many resources in her build since she's very free-to-play friendly. To get her DPS potential to the next level, Travelers should try to get her signature sword, Absolution, which will be featured on the upcoming Weapon Banner.

Sigewinne will be a powerful offensive support in Genshin Impact who can deal tons of damage even when she leaves the field, thanks to her Elemental Skill which allows her to create a Hydro bubble that bounces around the field and deals AoE damage. Sigewinne's Elemental Burst will equip her with a large syringe which she can use as a machine gun, also dealing AoE Hydro damage.

Leaks have suggested that Sethos' two best roles in Genshin Impact are main DPS and Electro Battery. This means that he could have decent synergy with Clorinde, indicating that they could appear on the same Limited Character Banner. These leaks should still be taken with a grain of salt since HoYoverse could still make some changes to their new characters in the upcoming weeks.

item.title: Tomb Raider Remastered Physical Collector's Edition Includes Lara Croft's Guns
item.description:
Highlights

  • Tomb Raider 1-3 Remastered Collector's Edition includes replica pistols, posters, trading cards, and more for die-hard fans and collectors.
  • Limited Run Games is offering a physical release of the remastered collection, catering to those who prefer physical editions over digital ones.
  • The collection includes all expansions, secret levels, and restored content from the original titles, available for Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, and Xbox One.

Tomb Raider 1-3 Remastered 's physical release will be getting a Standard and Collector's Edition. While Tomb Raider 1-3 Remastered was released on multiple platforms in February 2024, it has only been available for purchase via digital stores. The collection was a semi-faithful recreation of the original games, albeit with some minor quality-of-life changes, as well as a fresh coat of graphical paint. As such, some collectors and die-hard fans wished for the existence of a physical copy to own.

With the Tomb Raider franchise's future having no confirmed direction yet, it may be a while until a new entry will be ready for fans. As such, there's a chance that those looking for their tomb-raiding fix will want to have a copy of the remastered collection. On this note, Limited Run Games comes to the rescue as it has opened pre-orders for the game's physical release.

Related
Tomb Raider Remastered Collection Includes Content Warning

The Tomb Raider: 1-3 Remastered collection comes with a warning that denounces some of the content from the original trilogy as highly offensive.

As announced on Limited Run Games' Twitter, Tomb Raider 1-3 Remastered will come in both a Standard and Collector's Edition. The Standard Edition will include just the game itself, but the Collector's Edition is where the meat is at. Those who purchase this version will get to feel like their favorite Tomb Raider thanks to replicas of Lara Croft's iconic pistols will be included in the package. The pistols will be contained in their own lit shadowbox. The Collector's Edition will also include several posters, trading cards, polygonal figures, and more. It looks like Limited Run Games is going to give fans a lot of unique items for their collections.

What Will the Tomb Raider 1-3 Remastered Collector's Edition Include?

  • Physical Copy of Tomb Raider I-III Remastered for Nintendo Switch
  • Tomb Raider I-III Remastered Collector’s Edition Box
  • Classic Lara Croft Pistol Replicas in Lit Shadowbox
  • Polygonal Figures – In-Game Accurate Models from Each Title
  • Set of Three 12 x 16 inch Posters
  • Premium Trading Cards
  • Soundtrack
  • Steelbook
  • Map Book

The advertisement clearly notes that the collection itself will include all expansions, as well as secret levels. This includes content removed from and then restored to the remastered Tomb Raider titles . Even fans who have experienced the classic games will have reason to purchase these new versions on any of the modern consoles, as the physical copies will be available for Switch, PS4, PS5, and Xbox One. There doesn't seem to be an Xbox Series X/S version available in the store, but no reason has been given as to why it doesn't exist.

Limited Run Games has done well in a niche market. With the gradual shift to digital consumerism, many old-school fans worry about being able to purchase physical editions. The solutions brought about by Limited Run Games has allowed many classic games from the previous generations of gaming to be playable on modern systems such as Switch and PlayStation . Not only will younger fans be able to experience old titles, it also means that collectors will be able to complete and preserve their gaming archives and displays.

item.title: Mom Makes Custom Pikachu Tie-Dye Shirt for Daughter
item.description:
Highlights

  • Pikachu remains a beloved Pokemon character, with strong ties to the franchise's animated series and video games.
  • Fan art, like the custom tie-dyed Pikachu shirt a mom made for her child, showcases the creativity and dedication of Pokemon enthusiasts.
  • While Pikachu's popularity can lead to oversaturation, fans continue to show appreciation by creating art in various mediums like fashion and functional items.

A creative mom made a custom tie-dyed Pokemon shirt featuring Pikachu for her daughter. The Pokemon community loves making fan art inspired by their favorite characters using various mediums, from traditional paintings to 3D terrariums.

One of the most popular Pokemon in the franchise is Pikachu, who's long been the main protagonist in the Pokemon animated series. Pikachu is known as Ash's close companion, who competes in various tournaments and beats strong Gym Leaders. Even though the mainline Pokemon series has new protagonists now, Pikachu's legacy remains as it continues to be a mainstay in video games like Pokemon Scarlet and Violet and Pokemon GO .

Related
Pokemon GO Players Give Important Tip for PvP and Raids

Pokemon GO players give a tip for PvP and Raids, and it's important information for trainers who want to set up a competitive team.

Pokemon fans often show their appreciation for Pikachu through art , and one mom called 49th_vibration_dyes made a tie-dye shirt with Pikachu in the front and a big red Poke Ball at the back. In a Reddit post, she said that she made the shirt for her daughter, who loved the design.

In the comments, many Pokemon fans found the mom's effort to create a Pikachu shirt endearing and praised her tie-dye skills, noting that she managed to capture Pikachu's likeness and the Poke Ball's design while still maintaining their personal art style. One fan also compared Pikachu to the viral ice cream popsicle, which showed Pikachu with a hilarious melted face.

Wearable Pokemon merchandise, both official and fanmade, is popular among fans who want to flaunt their love for the franchise through fashion. Recently, UNIQLO unveiled a summer 2024 Pokemon collaboration featuring a wide selection of shirts with Pikachu, Eevee, Gengar, Piplup, and other popular Pokemon printed on them. Meanwhile, there are also people who make other functional items with Pokemon designs, like custom sneakers, storage boxes, and home decor.

Pikachu's Popularity Can Be a Problem

Despite the popularity of Pikachu, a number of fans are also feeling fatigued over seeing the pocket monster in every Pokemon medium. Recently, Pokemon GO fans expressed their frustration over getting another Pikachu variant, which is usually Pikachu wearing themed hats that is not able to evolve into Raichu. The fans voiced out that there's an oversaturation of the Pokemon in the video game and that it could also take up a lot of space in their in-game storage if they decide to catch them during special events. While the players' concerns are valid, it's unlikely that Pokemon GO and other similar titles will stop making Pikachu variants anytime soon.
